languages.text: {n}Соломон с достоинством поднимает подбородок.{/n} "Вы можете утверждать, что моя рекомендация была неверной, но я не заставлял вас принимать именно это решение. Мне больше нечего добавить".
{n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон с достоинством поднимает подбородок.{/n} "Вы можете утверждать, что моя рекомендация была неверной, но я не заставлял вас принимать именно это решение. Мне больше нечего добавить".

{n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは誇り高く顎を上げた。{/n}「私の進言に不備があったと考えるのは自由です。ですが、私はそれを実行するように強制したわけではありません。これ以上言うべきことは何もありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは誇り高く顎を上げた。{/n}「私の進言に不備があったと考えるのは自由です。ですが、私はそれを実行するように強制したわけではありません。これ以上言うべきことは何もありません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hebt würdevoll sein Kinn.{/n} "Ihr mögt meine Empfehlung für falsch halten, aber ich habe Euch nicht gezwungen, danach zu handeln. Mehr habe ich nicht hinzuzufügen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hebt würdevoll sein Kinn.{/n} "Ihr mögt meine Empfehlung für falsch halten, aber ich habe Euch nicht gezwungen, danach zu handeln. Mehr habe ich nicht hinzuzufügen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne redresse la tête dignement.{/n} « Vous pouvez juger mes recommandations comme étant imparfaites. Cependant, je ne vous ai aucunement {mf|forcé|forcée} à les suivre. Je n'ai rien à ajouter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne redresse la tête dignement.{/n} « Vous pouvez juger mes recommandations comme étant imparfaites. Cependant, je ne vous ai aucunement {mf|forcé|forcée} à les suivre. Je n'ai rien à ajouter. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta el mentón con gesto digno.{/n} «Es libre de opinar que mi recomendación no fue apropiada; sin embargo, no le obligué a seguirla. No tengo más que añadir».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta el mentón con gesto digno.{/n} «Es libre de opinar que mi recomendación no fue apropiada; sin embargo, no le obligué a seguirla. No tengo más que añadir».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙扬起了下巴，以充满尊严的语气开了口。{/n}“或许你确实认为我的建议有缺陷，但我并没有强迫你做出任何决定。我要说的只有这些。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙扬起了下巴，以充满尊严的语气开了口。{/n}“或许你确实认为我的建议有缺陷，但我并没有强迫你做出任何决定。我要说的只有这些。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, ağırbaşlı bir şekilde başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Tavsiyemi kusurlu bulabilirsiniz ancak sizi böyle bir şeye ben zorlamadım. Söyleyeceklerim bu kadar."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his chin with dignity.{/n} "You may consider my recommendation flawed; however, I did not force you to act on it. I have nothing more to add."
